body:
> The hard part is the output.library option. If that supported multiple entry points better, we could get the rest of the info from the compilation object and loop through each asset.

Oh, I know how to deal with that. If you set it to `"[name]"`, the same variable expansion that you use for `filename` will expand to the right thing. So if you  know how to make the plugin work with multiple entrypoints, I think we're all set.
